sentence_zh_TW: 這位音樂家的表演總是讓觀眾感到驚嘆，他的技巧無與倫比。
sentence: The musician's performance always ______ the audience, showcasing his unparalleled skill.

sentence_zh_TW: 他的存在讓這個派對更加活躍，朋友們都因為他的幽默感而感到高興。
sentence: His ______ made the party more lively, as friends were delighted by his sense of humor.

sentence_zh_TW: 這些腐爛的水果散發出難聞的氣味，讓人無法忍受。
sentence: These ______ fruits emit a foul odor that is unbearable.

sentence_zh_TW: 許多父母希望孩子能夠擁有快樂的童年，這使得他們在教育和活動方面做出明智的選擇。
sentence: Many parents hope their children can have a ______ childhood, which leads them to make wise choices in education and activities.

sentence_zh_TW: 在正式的晚宴上，服務員通常會為客人提供各種不同類型的葡萄酒，以搭配不同的菜餚。
sentence: At formal dinners, waiters often offer guests a variety of different types of ______ to complement various dishes.

sentence_zh_TW: 隨著科技的進步，許多航空公司開始提供越來越多的服務，以滿足乘客的需求。
sentence: With advancements in technology, many ______ are beginning to provide an increasing range of services to meet passenger needs.

sentence_zh_TW: 在特殊的場合上，許多人選擇佩戴奢華的珠寶來增添自己的魅力。
sentence: On special occasions, many people choose to wear luxurious ______ to enhance their charm.

sentence_zh_TW: 一位技術高超的裁縫能夠將任何布料變成完美合身的衣物，讓人看起來更有自信。
sentence: A skilled ______ can transform any fabric into perfectly fitting clothing, making people feel more confident.

sentence_zh_TW: 在音樂會上，音樂的音量可以被調整，以確保每位觀眾都能享受到最佳的聽覺體驗。
sentence: At concerts, the ______ of the music can be adjusted to ensure every audience member enjoys the best auditory experience.

sentence_zh_TW: 在準備大餐時，用勺子攪拌鍋中的食材是非常重要的，這樣才能確保味道均勻。
sentence: When preparing a feast, it’s essential to ______ the ingredients in the pot with a spoon to ensure the flavors are well mixed.

sentence_zh_TW: 如果不獲得足夠的食物，動物可能會在野外面臨饑餓的危險，這對生態系統造成威脅。
sentence: If not provided with enough food, animals in the wild might face the danger of ______, putting the entire ecosystem at risk.

sentence_zh_TW: 在紀念活動中，參加者通常會有條不紊地行進，以表達他們對特定議題的支持。
sentence: At commemorative events, participants often ______ in an orderly fashion to express their support for a particular cause.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這個時代，尋找真正的朋友比以往任何時候都更加重要，因為他們會在你需要幫助時支持你。
sentence: In this day and age, finding a ______ friend is more important than ever, as they will support you when you need help.

sentence_zh_TW: 警察在追捕逃犯時，可能會使用特定的武器和子彈，以保護自己和他人免受傷害。
sentence: Police may use specific weapons and ______ during the pursuit of a fleeing suspect to protect themselves and others from harm.

sentence_zh_TW: 許多科學家花費數年的時間來發展新的理論，這些理論可以幫助我們理解宇宙的奧秘。
sentence: Many scientists spend years developing new ______ that can help us understand the mysteries of the universe.

sentence_zh_TW: 購買二手商品時，了解所購買產品的歷史對於判斷其是否值得擁有是非常有幫助的，尤其是那些已經使用的物品。
sentence: When buying second-hand items, understanding the history of the products you’re purchasing is very helpful, especially for those that are ______.

sentence_zh_TW: 為了保持良好的健康，確保攝取足夠的維他命是非常重要的，這有助於增強免疫系統。
sentence: To maintain good health, ensuring sufficient intake of ______ is essential, as it helps boost the immune system.

sentence_zh_TW: 在許多文化中，結婚被視為一個重要的儀式，象徵著夫妻之間的承諾與連結。
sentence: In many cultures, people view ______ as an important ritual symbolizing the commitment and bond between spouses.

sentence_zh_TW: 在超市購物時，顧客常常會使用手推車來攜帶他們所選擇的商品，以方便購物。
sentence: When shopping at the supermarket, customers often use a ______ to carry the items they select, making the shopping experience easier.

sentence_zh_TW: 許多人喜愛在寬廣的戶外環境中進行各種活動，例如遠足、露營和騎自行車。
sentence: Many people enjoy engaging in various activities in vast ______ environments, such as hiking, camping, and biking.
